Pre-Game Insights: Brooklyn Nets (13-24, 12th in the Eastern Conference) vs. Denver Nuggets (21-15, fourth in the Western Conference)
The Nuggets have gone 11-7 in home games and average 13.6 turnovers per game.
The Nets are 8-12 on the road and have a 3-15 record in games decided by 10 or more points.
Nikola Jokic is averaging 31.5 points, 13 rebounds, 9.7 assists, and 1.7 steals for the Nuggets.
Cameron Johnson is scoring 19.5 points per game with 4.3 rebounds and 3.0 assists for the Nets.

Injuries: Nuggets have Aaron Gordon, DaRon Holmes II, Spencer Jones, and Nikola Jokic listed as day-to-day or out for the season. Nets have Cam Thomas, Bojan Bogdanovic, Dariq Whitehead, Ben Simmons, D'Angelo Russell, Trendon Watford, Maxwell Lewis, De'Anthony Melton, and Day'Ron Sharpe listed as injured.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is scheduled for Friday, 9 p.m. EST.
The Nuggets average 12.0 made 3-pointers per game, while the Nets allow 13.6, with the Nets shooting 44.8% from the field compared to the Nuggets' opponents' 46.6%.
